name: Color Hole & Blocks
description:
Color Hole & Blocks

Need to move the hole with one finger and Collect all white cubes and avoid red cubes.

Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PranayMunda.ColorHoleBlocks

Enjoy Color Hole & Blocks

This is an offline game where you need to collect all the white cubes and avoid red cubes. It is fun and simple play it to relax.

Color Hole & Blocks is a 3D hyper casual game completely free and offline. Easy to play. Play it any time you want. You will see awesome colorful 3D design and fun arcade levels.

Fill the Black hole with white cubes and have best arcade experience.
Use the Black Hole to Swallow everything into it.
Sink all the cubes in this casual additive game.

Have Fun!

Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PranayMunda.ColorHoleBlocks
